sense.gloss: to press against, to push against, to force against
to foist on (task, responsibility), to impose (one's will)

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑他人↑↓たにん↓に|↑押↑↓お↓し↑付↑↓つ↓ける|のはよくない。
sdata.e: It's not good to force our ideas on others.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑人↑↓ひと↓に|↑押↑↓お↓し↑付↑↓つ↓ける|べきではない。
sdata.e: We shouldn't impose our opinions on other people.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑他人↑↓たにん↓に|↑押↑↓お↓し↑付↑↓つ↓ける|のはよくない。
sdata.e: It isn't good to force our ideas on others.
